Summary: Light moves erratically and hovers over house and cornfield
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
divs: sighting detailsok, so im not one to jump to conclusions about weird darting lights in the night sky but tonight i undeniably saw an incredibly strange flying object over the corn field behind our house, and i have not been able to find any explanations as to what it might have been on the internet so far. i was standing outside smoking a cigerette... thanking my lucky stars for my new car that i just got today by some unimaginable stroke of luck or favor, and i was for some reason compelled to look to the heavens. right above the roof of my house at about 90* (but far enough away that i couldnt see the complete outline)- and this is around 10:30 at night mind you- there is this darting flying object...... it blinks red.... then darts to the left and blinks white.... then red .... then white.... then blue or something..... the strange thing wasnt the colors of the lights.... it was the speed patterns by which they blinked... completely out of sync... unlike an airplane ... i thought at first that it was airplane.... but it zig-zagged .... and moved accross the sky so phenomenally fast that all that i could do was stand there absolutely dumbfounded and stare in disbelief! oh, and did i mention that i couldnt hear a thing? i kept waiting for the "swoosh" sound you hear when a plane flys over head, but it never came.... the nearest airport is almost an hour away too. plus planes are slow in the sky and fly in a straight line normally right? i think that the thought crossed my mind at some point at i stood there frozen in terror that my room mates might find this interesting, and that maybe i should call out for them, but i felt that if i spoke or moved that it might dissapear, and that i would miss this fanciful display of what seemed to be happy lights that i would like to think were dancing just for me. i felt that it wanted me to see it for some reason..... like it was checking me out or something? it traveled in an arch.... right along my line of vision.... from one side of the sky.... all the way over in a semicicle pattern to above the cornfield behind my house at about 0*...... all the while with the crazy blinking flipping lights in circular motions.... like nemo swimming in the ocean in "finding nemo" the movie or ......swirling about like a dolphin flipping in the air..... then it just hovered.... and dimmed a little.... it didnt move.... it just.....it just....hovered. so anyways, i watched this thing for like ten minuets, which seemed like an eternity (after all how many ufo's does one get to see live in a lifetime? :-) my eyes got so tired of staring at it that i got bored and went into the house after i was dissapointed by the lack of an army of little grey men decending upon our cornfield by means of what i always imagined would be a tractor beam of light f i ever did see a "ufo"...... ....-joey (a new believer\former skeptic)
